name: Peanut Butter and Nutella Panini
recipeIngredient: 24 slices of Pepperidge Farm Very Thin white bread

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a panini press or George Foreman grill. Spread about 2 teaspoons peanut butter on each of 12 slices of bread. Spread about 1 tablespoon Nutella on each of the other 12. Put the peanut butter and Nutella slices together and grill until marked and crispy. Use a silicone spatula to remove.
